item.description:
Hello All,
Thank you, to all those who participated in our first Boston's MOST FABULOUS MEETUP PUP!!!
Voting is now open and will be available until April 4th 11:59 PM. Synopses regarding our finalists are posted in both the ?Files? section of the site.
Remember each pup that wins Most Fabulous in their meet-up group will then move on to the Doggie Day Meet-up Pup finals. The pup to win the title of Doggie Day Meet-up Pup will receive a complimentary birthday party for them and 9 of their closest puppy friends. The winner of the Chihuahua group will also be treated to a special doggy Spa Day!!! 2nd and 3rd prizes will be announced at our next meet up.
Good luck!!!
Also, since our next meet up is scheduled to fall on Mother?s Day, we have adjusted the date of the next DOGGIE DAY MEETUP for MAY 5th
As a special treat we will take the time to reflect and celebrate in style with the announcement of our winner and a little Cinco de Mayo celebration!!! Saturday, May 5th 1-3PM!!!!

After all, this is a Chihuahua group?..
Note only the date for the May Doggie Day meetup has changed, if you had plans to attend our Brookline site on the 13th, that meet up will remain as scheduled. PLEASE UPDATE YOUR RSVP as to which location you will attend!

Locations:
1. Doggie Day -- 400 Tremont Street in Boston
2. Paws for a Cause -- 1386 Beacon Street in Brookline (Coolidge Corner)
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua May Meetup
